showerReviews.reviewText: Great beach for swimming with friends and the family has nets for volleyball and bonfire pits also has a heated shower room for both guys and girls as well as a concessions stand lifeguards on duty til 430pm
Nice wide open, has an eatery and shower house, volleyball, baseball and 9 hole golf course.  Plenty of parking and pavilions
Clean beach, lifeguard on duty from 10:00am-4:30pm. Bathrooms, outdoor shower and food bar.

showerReviews.reviewText: It was nice. I enjoyed walking, and getting wet in the water was pretty clear and clean. They have bathrooms and an outside shower.  You can take the sun day or go to the shade trees ğŸŒ³. Lots of parking  free for Bridgeport residents. I know â€¦

When compared to other state beaches, this one probably has more rocks and shells than average and a less good foot washing/outdoor shower area. Still a nice place to visit. Probably worth going to if itâ€™s the closest one to you.
Nice spacious state park. Lot of places to barbecue and play in the sand. Trash disposal available. Well maintained restrooms and shower head.

â€¦ there is an area for barbecuing and picnic tables which is great. The bathrooms are very clean and there is also a shower to wash off sand, which I was happy to use. I will definitely come back again, as this is my second time coming â€¦
â€¦ Have outdoor shower and clean bathroom. Lots of space for cookouts and picnics.

â€¦ a mess, a urinal is leaking all over the floor and had been for some time.  Outdoor shower drains were plugged so sand accumilated all over.  I have been to Hamonasett and Silver Sands, both CT state beaches this summer and found them â€¦
Needs shower to rinse off from the seawater.
